rows.Name: Path_Invariant
rows.Comment:
For this type of PTP Movement the path in space isindependent of the override and,
except for blending with TransitionModeTMStartVelocity,
of all dynamic limits of the axes
(ancillary and global limits for speed, acceleration, deceleration and jerk).with TransitionModeTMCornerDistanceindependent of the type of blending
(BlendingHigh / Low / Previous / Next).not left at Halt or Stop (MC_GroupHalt/MC_GroupStop).not left when interrupting and continuing (MC_GroupInterrupt/MC_GroupContinue).
